item.title: Introduction to Open Source Hardware
item.description: Soâ€¦ you want to know about Open Source Hardware? This page is an introduction to what Open Source Hardware means, how it works, and why it matters. Other pages in this Open Source Heuristic category will expand your understanding of Open Source Hardware; however, if you need a place to begin, this is a good start! See the following sections below: What is Open Source Hardware? Takeaway
